title: How to Budget on Irregular Income
excerpt: Budgeting strategies for freelancers, gig workers, and anyone with variable income streams.
editorial_summary: This guide from the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau provides practical budgeting strategies for people with irregular income. It covers calculating your average monthly income, creating a baseline budget, prioritizing expenses, building an emergency fund, and using percentage-based budgets. The content is designed for freelancers, gig workers, and seasonal employees who face income unpredictability. It emphasizes the importance of building a cash buffer to smooth out income fluctuations.
